query: query PlayerProfileQuery( $id: Int = 1 $matchId: Int = 100 $tourId: Int = 10 $site: String = "cricket") { player(id: $id, matchId: $matchId, tourId: $tourId, site: $site) { artwork { src } stats { dob performance { match { name startTime } points selectionRate } } credits points name type { name } squad { name } playerProfileDisplay }}
